mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (isbn, title, description, publisher, cover_image, publish_date, total_copies, available_copies, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{description}, #{publisher}, #{coverImage}, #{publishDate}, #{totalCopies}, #{availableCopies}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET isbn = #{isbn}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, publisher = #{publisher}, cover_image = #{coverImage}, publish_date = #{publishDate}, total_copies = #{totalCopies}, available_copies = #{availableCopies}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
SELECT * FROM book WHERE author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{authorName}, '%')
SELECT b.*, COUNT(br.id) as borrow_count FROM book b LEFT JOIN borrow_record br ON b.id = br.book_id GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY borrow_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
